accueil.para1: Today, the T-shirt is an essential garment in everyone's wardrobe. And in an era where environmental concerns are more relevant than ever, we prefer T-shirts made in Quebec to reduce environmental impact and promote local craftsmanship.
accueil.para2: V-neck, crew neck, loose or fitted, short-sleeved or long-sleeved for the colder days, solid or patterned to style an outfit... The T-shirt is available in a variety of colors, styles, and patterns.
